description: This file defines a React component 'QuotesPage' that displays and manages a list of quotes with filtering, approval, and rejection functionalities. It imports external components and API functions, and manages state and side effects related to quote data.

methods.name: fetchQuotes
methods.description: Fetches quotes from the backend API based on current filters and updates the state.

methods.name: onApprove
methods.description: Handles approving a quote by updating its status via API and updating local state.

methods.name: onReject
methods.description: Handles rejecting a quote by updating its status via API and updating local state.
